name: Linguine With Tomato 'fillets'
keywords: extra virgin olive oil, linguine, plum tomato, fall, main course
recipeIngredient: 1 28-ounce can plum tomatoes, or about 2 pounds peeled fresh tomatoes

recipeInstructions.text: Cut tomatoes into strips, discarding seeds and juice; place in a strainer to drain while you bring a pot of salted water to the boil for the pasta. Start the sauce in the next step, and start cooking pasta when water boils.

Combine tomatoes, oil, garlic, salt and pepper in a 10-inch skillet, and bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Cook briskly for about 5 minutes (8 minutes for fresh tomatoes), stirring occasionally. The tomatoes should remain in pieces, and there should be no liquid remaining in the pan other than the oil.
Toss the pasta with the sauce and the basil or parsley, and serve immediately.
